name: Athenaeus-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected versions of the works of Athenaeus of Naucratis, Greek rhetorician and grammarian.
body:
#Welcome to athenaeus-dev!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of public-domain editions of Athenaeus of Naucratis, a Greek rhetorician and grammarian. This work is part of the [Digital Athenaeus](http://digitalathenaeus.org/) project at the University of Leipzig.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who corrected and encoded hOCR output generated by [Bruce Robertson](https://github.com/brobertson?tab=activity) in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

A Wikipedia link to this repository can be viewed [here](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athenaeus).

##Contents
* [Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum. Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusKaibel_1.xml): _Libri I-V_ (1887) Ed. Georg Kaibel. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* [Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum. Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusKaibel_2.xml): _Libri VI-X_ (1887) Ed. Georg Kaibel. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* [Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum. Vol. 3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusKaibel_3.xml): _Libri XI-XV_, Indices (1962) Ed. Georg Kaibel. Stutgardiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* [Athenaei Deipnosophistae. Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusMeineke_1.xml): _Lib. I-VI_ (1858) Ed. August Meineke. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* [Athenaei Deipnosophistae. Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusMeineke_2.xml): _Lib. VII-XII_ (1858) Ed. August Meineke. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* [Athenaei Deipnosophistae. Vol. 3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusMeineke_3.xml): _Lib. XIII-XV. Summaria et Indices_ (1859) Ed. August Meineke. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* [Athenaei Deipnosophistae. Vol. 4](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeusMeineke_4.xml): _Analecta Critica_ (1867) Ed. August Meineke. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.


* [Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum. Vols. 1-3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeus_kaibel_1-3.txt). Ed. Georg Kaibel. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri (**plain text file**).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
